name: hiring_post
description: Modern hiring post with bold text and accent color for job position

samples.heading: We're Hiring!
samples.subheading: Join our amazing team. We're looking for talented individuals.

fieldPrompt.heading: Write a compelling, attention-grabbing headline (2-3 words, max 18 characters) that creates excitement about the opportunity. Examples: We're Hiring!, Join Our Team, Now Recruiting, Open Positions. Use action words and create urgency.
fieldPrompt.subheading: Craft an engaging description (1-2 sentences, max 70 characters) that highlights your company culture, values, and what makes this opportunity special. Focus on benefits to potential candidates and your company's unique selling points.
fieldPrompt.job_title: Enter the specific job position you're hiring for (max 3-4 words). Examples: Senior Developer, Marketing Manager, UX Designer, Data Scientist. Be clear and specific about the role.
fieldPrompt.company_name: Enter your company name as you want it to appear on the post (e.g., Acme Inc., TechStart Solutions, Your Company). Use the official name or preferred branding.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear, action-oriented call-to-action (2-3 words). Examples: Apply Now, Join Us, Learn More, Get Started. Make it compelling and easy to understand.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code that represents your brand identity (e.g., #7d00eb for purple, #FF6B6B for red). Choose a color that aligns with your company's visual branding and creates the right emotional response.
